article.description: Rob Jones had 12 points and 13 rebounds, and Saint Mary's defeated Portland 70-43 on Thursday night to give the Gaels at least a share of the West Coast Conference title for the second straight season.
article.shortLinkText: Gaels secure at least a share of WCC title
article.headline: Rob Jones' double-double helps Saint Mary's to skid-snapping win over Portland
article.linkText: Gaels secure at least a share of WCC title
article.story: PORTLAND, Ore. -- Rob Jones had 12 points and 13 rebounds, and Saint Mary's defeated Portland 70-43 on Thursday night to give the Gaels at least a share of the West Coast Conference title for the second straight season. The victory snapped a two-game losing streak for Saint Mary's (24-5, 13-2), which had lost three of its previous four games. Clint Steindl finished with 15 points. Nemanja Mitrovic had 14 points for the Pilots (6-22, 3-12), who have lost four straight and 10 of their past 11 games. Portland went up 14-11 early after Mitrovic's layup and free throw. But the Gaels responded with a 9-0 run capped by Matthew Dellavedova's layup that made it 20-14 midway through the first half. Saint Mary's pulled away from there, leading 35-18 at the half. The Gaels led by as many as 31 points in the second half.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
